lessons.title: Home Row
lessons.content: asdf jkl;

lessons.title: Short Paragraph
lessons.content: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

lessons.title: Punctuation Practice
lessons.content: Hello, world! Typing can be fun. Are you ready?

lessons.title: Focusing on S Keys
lessons.content: She sells seashells by the seashore. Sally swiftly typed the sentence.

lessons.title: Homer's Odyssey Snippet
lessons.content: Tell me, Muse, of the man of many ways, who was driven far journeys...

lessons.title: Tech Terms
lessons.content: Algorithm, function, variable, compile, interpret, syntax, array, object, class.

lessons.title: Nature Focus
lessons.content: Trees sway in the gentle breeze. Birds chirp at dawn. Flowers bloom in spring.

lessons.title: Motivational Quotes
lessons.content: Believe you can and you're halfway there. Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.

lessons.title: Keyboard Drills
lessons.content: Type these letters quickly: f d s a j k l ;

lessons.title: Shopping List
lessons.content: Milk, eggs, bread, cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, cereal, pasta, sauce.

lessons.title: Days of the Week
lessons.content: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday.

lessons.title: Months of the Year
lessons.content: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December.

lessons.title: Short Tongue Twister
lessons.content: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers.

lessons.title: Planets
lessons.content: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune.

lessons.title: Colors
lessons.content: Red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, violet.

lessons.title: Short Poem
lessons.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, typing practice is fun, especially for you.

lessons.title: Commonly Confused Words
lessons.content: Their, there, they're. Your, you're. Its, it's.

lessons.title: Java Code Snippet
lessons.content: public class Hello { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello World"); } }

lessons.title: Python Code Snippet
Simple Sentence
lessons.content: I love typing on my keyboard every day.

lessons.title: Final Practice
lessons.content: Speed and accuracy lead to mastery. Keep practicing your typing skills.
